Comments.tags: OPTIONAL; Tags used by this file.
Comments.TAG: OPTIONAL; A tag for grouping multiple 'key_parts' under one name.
Comments.key_root: OPTIONAL; If key doesn't start with 'key_root', it's skipped.
Comments.inclusions: Program takes part of key after last '.' character, then divides it along '_' characters into 'key_parts'. Pattern is applied only if all 'inclusions' are among 'key_parts'.
Comments.exclusions: OPTIONAL; Like above, except pattern is NOT applied if element from 'exclusions' is among 'key_parts'.

action.begin: Add 'value' at the beginning of key's value, separated with 'separator'.
action.end: Add 'value' at the end of key's value, separated with 'separator'.
action.replace: Replace all 'replace_what' with 'replace_with' in key's value.

Comments.value: Text used by pattern in actions 'base', 'begin', 'end'.
Comments.separator: OPTIONAL; Text (or character) used to separate key's value and 'value'. Used in actions 'begin', 'end'.
Comments.replace_what: What part of key's value to replace, used in 'replace' action.
Comments.replace_with: Text that replaces parts of key's value, used in 'replace' action.
